name: Chacha Tower
description: {'Information:': ['Chacha Tower is a modern tower located in the city of Batumi, Georgia, and is one of the prominent tourist attractions.'], 'Historical importance:': ['The tower is a symbol of modern Georgian culture and its name dates back to the traditional "Chatha" drink, which is part of the cultural heritage in Georgia.'], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['A long tower with a modern design with effects of Georgian culture', 'The tower includes an elevator that allows visitors to enjoy a panoramic view of the city of Batumi', 'A statue made of glass at the top of the tower symbolizes Georgian culture'], 'working hours:': ['It opens daily from 10:00 am until 8:00 pm.']}

name: Miracle Park
description: {'Location': ['Miracle Park in Batumi, Georgia, is a distinctive tourist destination that combines modern architectural landmarks and scenic landscapes.', 'The park is located on the waterfront of the city of Batumi, providing great views of the Black Sea.'], 'Historical importance:': ['The miracle garden is a cultural and entertainment center in Batumi, as it hosts various events and festivals, such as concerts and cultural festivals.'], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['Alphabet Tower: a 130 -meter tower, represents the Georgian alphabet, and is a symbol of the cultural identity of the city.', 'Status of Love: A moving statue tells a love story between a young man and a girl, moving towards each other every 10 minutes, creating a unique romantic scene.', 'Ferris Wheel: a rotating wheel that provides panoramic views of the city and the sea, and is one of the most prominent features of entertainment in the garden.', 'Clock Tower (CHACHA TOWER): a 25 -meter high tower, known as the distribution of the traditional Georgian "Chatha" drink for free every evening at 7:00.'], 'working hours:': ['The garden is open to visitors 24 hours, allowing to enjoy its beauty at any time of the day.']}
short_description: Patumi miracle garden includes distinctive features such as the alphabet and Ferris wheel with great looks.

name: 6 May Park
description: {'Location': ['The May 6 Park in Batumi is one of the oldest public parks in Georgia, founded in 1881, and is an ideal destination for relaxation and entertainment.', 'The park is located in the heart of the city of Batumi, near the Black Sea, providing visitors with picturesque looks on the coast.'], 'Historical importance:': ["The park was founded in 1881, and contributed to the city's development as a tourist and entertainment destination."], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['Artificial lake: It is a center for water activities, where visitors can rent pedal boats to roam in the lake.', 'Zoo: includes a variety of animals and birds, making it an ideal place for families and children.', "Games area: It contains children's entertainment, including water games and stadiums.", 'Green spaces: they feature various trees and plants, providing a calm environment for relaxation and enjoying nature.'], 'working hours:': ['The garden is open to visitors 24 hours, allowing visitors to enjoy it at any time of the day.']}
short_description: The May 6 Park in Batumi is characterized by green spaces, an industrial lake and a children's animal garden.

name: Ethnographic Museum "Borjgalo"
description: {'Location': ['The ethnographic Portfo Museum is a distinguished cultural landmark located in the city of Batumi, Georgia, and is one of the most prominent tourist destinations in the region.', 'The museum is located in a quiet area about 2.9 km from the center of Batumi, which provides an appropriate environment for exploration and learning.'], 'Historical importance:': ['The museum was established about 40 years ago by the artist Kamal Tormandza, who invented a unique type of wood carving called "Portgo". The museum aims to preserve the cultural heritage of the Adjar region, the display of traditional handicrafts, agricultural activities and the typical residential buildings of the residents of the region.'], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['Satisfaction: The museum covers an area of \u200b\u200b3000 square meters, and includes walking walks and scenic landscapes, including a small waterfall, allowing visitors an interactive experience with the surrounding environment.', 'Exhibitions: The museum contains about 4000 pieces that display traditional handicrafts, agricultural tools, human figures, and exhibitions related to the daily life of the residents of the Edgar region.', 'Typical buildings: The museum includes examples of traditional residential and industrial buildings, allowing visitors a deep understanding of the lifestyle of the local population in the past.'], 'working hours:': ['The museum works daily from 10:00 am until 6:00 pm.']}
short_description: The ethnographic Porgloo Museum displays the cultural heritage of the Adjara region with traditional exhibits and model buildings.

name: Batumi archaeological museum
description: {'Location': ['Batumi Archaeological Museum is a prominent cultural landmark in the city of Batumi, Georgia, which includes a rich collection of artifacts that reflect the history and culture of the region.', 'The museum is located on Shafaffzahzah Street No. 77, Batumi, Georgia.'], 'Historical importance:': ['The museum was established in the early twentieth century and the museum is an important center for scientific research and education, making it a major source of understanding the history of the region in a deeper way.'], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['Archaeological exhibits: The museum contains artifacts dating back to different historical periods, including the bronze and medieval ages such as Georgian and foreign coins, bronze ships, glass utensils and ceramics.', 'Permanent and temporary exhibitions: The museum hosts a variety of exhibitions that highlight various aspects of Georgian history and culture.'], 'working hours:': ['The museum works daily from 10:00 am until 6:00 pm, except on Monday.']}
short_description: Batumi archaeological museum displays archaeological pieces that reflect the history and culture of the region since ancient times.

name: Batumi Botanical Garden
description: {'Location': ['Batome Botanical Park is one of the most prominent natural landmarks in the city of Batumi, Georgia, and is an ideal destination for nature lovers and botany.', 'The garden is located in the Miskti area of \u200b\u200bBatome, about 9 km north of the city and overlooks the Black Sea, providing picturesque views of the coast.'], 'Historical importance:': ['The park was founded in 1912 by the Russian plant scientist Andr Krasnov, with the aim of collecting and planting different plant species from around the world. The park is an important center for scientific research and environmental education and includes more than 43,000 species of rare and beautiful plants.'], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['Biodiversity: The park includes nine vegetable sectors, which contains 2,037 category units for plants, including types of different regions around the world.', 'Natural tracks: The garden features winding walking paths between trees and plants, allowing visitors to explore the beauty of nature and enjoy pure air.', 'Marine looks: The park provides panoramic views of the Black Sea, making it an ideal place to relax and meditate.'], 'working hours:': ['The park opens its doors for visitors daily from 9:00 am until 6:00 pm.']}
short_description: Batumi Botanical Garden was founded in 1912 and includes more than 43,000 species of rare plants.

name: Batumi dolphinarium
description: {'Location': ['Dolphinarium Batumi is located on Rostafili Street No. 51, Batumi, Georgia.', 'Dolphinarium Batumi is a distinguished tourist landmark located in the heart of the city of Batumi, Georgia, and is one of the most prominent entertainment destinations in the city.'], 'Historical importance:': ['Dolphinarium Batumi was opened in 1975 and was considered the first Dolphinarium show in the former Soviet Union and after a 20 -year hiatus was reopened at the initiative of the municipality of Batumi and the efforts of the charitable fund "Carto", to become a distinctive entertainment and educational center in the city.'], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['Entertainment shows: Dolphinarium Batumi offers impressive offers for trained dolphins that include acrobatic movements and high jokes, and water rotations, which surprises visitors of all ages.', 'Interacting with dolphins: The center provides programs that allow visitors to swim with dolphins, which allows a unique experience to get to know these marine creatures closely.', 'Aquarium: Dolphinarium Batumi includes a small water basin that contains a variety of marine organisms, allowing visitors to explore various marine life.'], 'working hours:': ['Dolphinarium Batumi works daily from 10:00 am until 9:00 pm, with a break from 1:30 pm until 2:30 pm.']}
short_description: Batumi Dolphinarium offers recreational offers for dolphins and allows interaction with them in a distinctive experience.

name: Alphabetic Tower
description: {'Location': ['The tower is located in the Batuli Bolivard walkway, near the Black Sea shore, allowing visitors to enjoy stunning views of the city and the sea.'], 'Historical importance:': ['The tower is a symbol of the Georgian language and its culture, as it includes 33 letters of the Georgian alphabet, which reflects the uniqueness of the Georgian language and people.'], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['Architectural design: The tower takes a dual spiral shape, inspired by the synthesis of DNA, which symbolizes the link of the language with Georgian identity.', 'Floors: the tower consists of three floors:', 'The first floor: It includes a cabinet that offers various drinks with panoramic views of the city.', 'The second floor: contains a restaurant that offers a variety of meals.', 'The third floor: dedicated to watching the city from a surveillance platform, equipped with perspectives for more enjoyment of views.'], 'working hours:': ['The tower works daily from 11:00 am to 12:00 midnight, allowing visitors to visit the tower at any time of the day.']}
short_description: Alphabetic Tower in Batumi is an architect that reflects the Georgian culture and great panoramic views.

name: Batumi Boulevard
description: {'Location': ['The walkway is located along the southern coast of the city of Batumi, allowing visitors to enjoy stunning views of the Black Sea and the city.'], 'Historical importance:': ["The walkway was established in 1881, and is considered part of the city's cultural heritage, as it witnessed many expansions and renovations over the decades."], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['"Ali and Nino" statue: It is located a short distance from the walkway, a moving statue that tells a love story between a young Muslim and a Christian girl, and is considered one of the most prominent artistic monuments in Batumi.', 'Alphabet Tower: It is located near the walkway, a tower with a height of 130 meters carrying the Georgian alphabet, and provides panoramic views of the city.', 'Bird Garden: It is one of the most prominent gardens in the walkway, where visitors can relax and enjoy nature.', 'Sports tracks: A dedicated path for cycling and silences is available, as well as walking and running paths, which makes it an ideal place for outdoor sports.', 'Restaurants and cafes: The walkway contains a variety of restaurants and cafes that offer local and international cuisine and drinks, with great sea views.'], 'working hours:': ['The walkway is open to visitors 24 hours, allowing them to enjoy different activities at any time of the day.']}
short_description: Patumi Bolivard is a tourist landmark on the Black Sea beach with various activities and stunning views.
